attributes.title: Why?
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see the work that cheeto has been putting out but it hasn‚Äôt been working out of all of the orange dust wafting through the screen. I thought that maybe something would pass through but the sea of cheddar remains just keeps flooding through!! Honestly i can‚Äôt even taste anything anymore i am desensitized to the cheese. This is the last time i‚Äôll be getting chips from the chum bucket next time i‚Äôll just go to McDonalds. Every time i opened the app i left with so much orange dust that it turned my pet bonsai turned orange and he can no longer go on drives to the dmv with me anymore. I blame this app for the complaints coming from my him as he would rather return to his natural complexion. While all colors do matter, it is important to bring attention to those that might be actively covered or targeted by cheeto dust.

attributes.title: I‚Äôm disgusted by this app.
attributes.review:
after opening the app, i was greeted with an old, crusty, rancid cheeto. after browsing the app trying to distract my mind from the horrific image, i found out that the cheeto is also a racist pedofile. i tried to exit the app, but it wouldn‚Äôt let me. i started to get worried when i heard a knock at the door. it was the cheeto himself. he barged into the house with several police officers, kidnapped my dog, (but i don‚Äôt have a dog) ate my brother, took all of the raw meat out of my freezer then proceeded to shove it down his throat in front of my face. he and his army of officers clogged all the toilets in my house. i began to wonder how they even got to my house. while i was cleaning up the massive üí© that he left on my floor, it clicked. the app uses my location. no one is safe. 
anyways, stream drag me down, fine line, walls, heartbreak weather, LP1, and mind of mine.

attributes.title: I am very disappointed with my purchase üòï
attributes.review:
So I was looking for food for my pet Tyrannosaurus rex ü¶ñ and he naturally really loves Cheetos so I downloaded this app thinking it was going to help me find the best Cheetos to buy in my area but when I opened it I saw this gross mistake of a Cheeto I looked and looked through the app and it is just this gross Cheeto over and over again so I ordered some of the product and tasted it OMG it tastes like somebody microwaved steel I was so sad for Laser (my Tyrannosaurus rex of course) I sent back the product and will not be buying this ever again my refrigerator, stove/oven, and microwave have also gone missing sense I downloaded this food app I‚Äôm very sad I will never buy this product again I demand this be taken off the App Store immediately thank you and have a great day. ü¶ñüòå

                          
                      Sincerely, Lonely Cowboy And Laser

attributes.title: CHEETOüíñüôàüßöüèª‍‚ôÄÔ∏èBUT IN A DUMPSTER
attributes.review:
Bee Movie Script - Dialogue Transcript

  
According to all known laws
of aviation,

  
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

  
Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

  
The bee, of course, flies anyway

  
because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.

  
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

  
Ooh, black and yellow!
Let's shake it up a little.

  
Barry! Breakfast is ready!

  
Ooming!

  
Hang on a second.

  
Hello?

  
- Barry?
- Adam?

  
- Oan you believe this is happening?
- I can't. I'll pick you up.

  
Looking sharp.

  
Use the stairs. Your father
paid good money for those.

  
Sorry. I'm excited.

  
Here's the graduate.
We're very proud of you, son.

  
A perfect report card, all B's.

  
Very proud.

  
Ma! I got a thing going here.

  
- You got lint on your fuzz.
- Ow! That's me!

  
- Wave to us! We'll be in row 118,000.
- Bye!

  
Barry, I told you,
stop flying in the house!

  
- Hey, Adam.
- Hey, Barry.

  
- Is that fuzz gel?
- A little. Special day, graduation.

  
Never thought I'd make it.

  
Three days grade school,
three days high school.

  
Those were awkward.

  
Three days college. I'm glad I took
a day and hitchhiked around the hive.

  
You did come back different.

  
- Hi, Barry.
- Artie, growing a mustache? Looks good.

attributes.title: I‚Äôm just shocked.
attributes.review: I am at an ABSOLUTE LOSS FOR WORDS! I know yes, we all collectively ADORE mr dementia himself ! ly donnie<3 but when I opened this app with the mission to sign up and do whatever I can to annihilate this god forsaken app, I was RUDELY met with the utter most disturbing, ghoulish, most gruesomely ugly face I have ever seen in my whole (obviously above 17) years of living!! I‚Äôm now terrified to even look at this app, let alone write a review, for that face has given me ptsd. And yes, I have already contacted a therapist about this issue, and yes we are now going to be meeting 3 times a week to discuss my trauma. so what I‚Äôm getting at is- I downloaded this FREE app, only for it to come right back and bite me in the brain, because now I need therapy, which IS NOT CHEAP. $100 each appointment...I don‚Äôt think I can even express my pure hatred of this app through words donnie. thank you for hearing my voice<3

attributes.title: trump‚Äôs rotten piece of rice (a short story)üòªüî´

attributes.title: Nasty Orange
attributes.review: This app is horrible and let me tell you why... Once i opened the app the Orange with really bad aging lines all over it showed up on my screen!!! I puked from disgust and then i went to ask my mom what it was but before i made it to her there were a bunch of little oranges like the ones on the screen, but they were chasing me!! I honestly do not understand why there were at MY house so, i talked to them and the BIT ME and then they threatened to throw me in the pacific ocean to drown with all the trash there. I stomped on every single one of them and then i had to clean it up before the respawned. but once i did that MORE CAME! so i went to my room and grabbed my lightsaber and started wracking them! once i got them all i needed to go to the E.R because i had all the toxic fumes inside of me. And that is why you should never get this app. Thank you!

Now last but not least this app is just hands down terrible it‚Äôs made for big racist stupid people and it‚Äôs sad that people actually take their time to download this crap it‚Äôs literal trash and I rather have it be deleted NOWWWWWWWW!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: Please Do Not Download
attributes.review: Hello all my fellow trump supporters! So i downloaded this app to be up to date with our AMAZING,ORANGE CHEETO president. I want to be able to be on top of my game when arguing with STUPID LEFTIST and GENERATION Z. I proceeded to download the app and sign up for the texts and then it happened... my phone started blowing up with text messages and not even from Trump but from SCAMMERSSS, but i just blocked all of them and continued on with my life as a great american Trump supporter. But a few days later, my phone started typing by itself and my instagram started following and liking all AOC‚Äôs posts and unfollowing Donald Trump! Can you believe that?! I thought it would end there with a quick restart on my phone...oh no. I got a phone call the next day and it was from a random number and obviously I answered it, that was when hell started. FOR PART 2 LIKE AND MARK THIS REVIEW AS HELPFUL!!
